languages.text: "Время не терпит, элантах. Чем быстрее мы отправимся на встречу с выжившими с Крудараха, тем больше у них шансов избежать очередной беды..."
"Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."
languages.original_text: "Время не терпит, элантах. Чем быстрее мы отправимся на встречу с выжившими с Крудараха, тем больше у них шансов избежать очередной беды..."

traits.locale_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “时间意味着一切，外界人。我们越早见到克鲁达拉赫的幸存者，他们就越有可能免受另一场灾难……”
languages.original_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."

traits.locale_text: “时间意味着一切，外界人。我们越早见到克鲁达拉赫的幸存者，他们就越有可能免受另一场灾难……”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Le temps presse, elantach. Plus vite nous pourrons retrouver les survivants de Crudarach, plus ils auront de chances d'éviter un nouveau désastre... »
languages.original_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."

traits.locale_text: « Le temps presse, elantach. Plus vite nous pourrons retrouver les survivants de Crudarach, plus ils auront de chances d'éviter un nouveau désastre... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «El tiempo vuela, elantach... Cuanto antes vayamos al encuentro de los supervivientes de Crudarach, más probable es que podamos evitar otro desastre...».
languages.original_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."

traits.locale_text: «El tiempo vuela, elantach... Cuanto antes vayamos al encuentro de los supervivientes de Crudarach, más probable es que podamos evitar otro desastre...».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「時はなによりも重要だ、エランタ――クルダラの生き残りに早く会えば、更なる厄災を避けられる可能性も高まる…」
languages.original_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."

traits.locale_text: 「時はなによりも重要だ、エランタ――クルダラの生き残りに早く会えば、更なる厄災を避けられる可能性も高まる…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Die Zeit drängt, Elantach. Je eher wir die Überlebenden von Crudarach treffen, desto größere ihre Chancen, einer weiteren Katastrophe zu entgehen ..."
languages.original_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."

traits.locale_text: "Die Zeit drängt, Elantach. Je eher wir die Überlebenden von Crudarach treffen, desto größere ihre Chancen, einer weiteren Katastrophe zu entgehen ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."

languages.text: "Kaybedecek zamanımız yok elantach. Crudarach'tan sağ kurtulanların yanına ne kadar çabuk ulaşırsak bir felaketi daha önleme şansımız da o kadar artar."
languages.original_text: "Time is of the essence, elantach — the sooner we go to meet the survivors from Crudarach, the better their chances of avoiding another disaster..."

traits.locale_text: "Kaybedecek zamanımız yok elantach. Crudarach'ta sağ kalanların yanına ne kadar erken ulaşırsak bir felaketi daha önleme şansımız da o kadar artar."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
